attributes.additional_details:
We are petitioning for the lease  renewal of the Barbican City YMCA, 2 Fann Street, Barbican London, EC2Y 8BR

The City of London and YMCA England have between them, decided not to renew the lease of the building and therefore all the residents of the building will loose their home and all employees their jobs. This means a large issue for hundreds of people, many of whom are young students, whom have only just left home, having to find new accommodation which provides the same services and safety as this building  at an affordable price. This will be almost impossible.
